data.title: Beer league
data.text:
General Note:

Title from container.

Originally released as a motion picture in 2006.

Special features: Unrated commentary with Artie Lange and Frank Sebastiano; "Beer goggles" short; unrated trailer; 'Beer league': behind-the-scenes; Live from CineVegas!; Artie behind the scenes with Jimmy Kimmel live! and 'The best damn sports show'; in the studio with Artie: jokes and ringtones; raw interviews; 'Beer league' photo gallery.

Summary, etc.:

A group of misfits have weekly softball games that descend more into fights for macho dominance than making home runs. When love enters his life, it unexpectedly alters Artie's low self-esteem; and the odds for winning, not only the league trophy but a new life, are considerably amped.
